title: [Evermore Hotel, Platform]
[Evermore Hotel, Lift]
description: Behind a gilded scissor gate, a platform operator stands at the ready, one hand on a polished brass lever clearly marked with the floors of the hotel.  The walls are covered with burnished cherrywood and silvered glass which reflects a cushioned bench covered in plush crimson velvet at the rear of the clockwork platform.  A low thrum emanates from behind the paneling.

Behind a gilded scissor gate, a lift operator stands at the ready, one hand on a polished brass lever clearly marked with the floors of the hotel.  The walls are covered with burnished cherrywood and silvered glass which reflects a cushioned bench covered in plush crimson velvet at the rear of the lift.  A low thrum emanates from behind the paneling.
